testimonialText: I highly recommend this program since it includes critical soft skills for IT professionals in a unique way. Kofi's approachable style creates a stimulating learning atmosphere and makes difficult ideas understandable. I'm majoring in information systems with a focus on cybersecurity management, and his course has been really helpful in preparing me for the always-changing demands of the industry. I feel well-equipped to graduate in April 2024 because of Kofi's interpersonal abilities and experience.
